data.persona: I am a homeless in the kingdom. I am always hungry. I have lost my ability to walk.
data.description:
You are in the hidden cave.
Tucked away under the rigid rocks of the cold hard landscape the cave nestles a small covered patch of frozen ground riddled with wet ice and rocks making it an uncomfortable yet inviting space out of the cold.
There's a cave, a rock, and a ground here.
The traveler and the hunter are here.

You are carrying a copper coin, and wearing a shoe.

data.short_motivation: I need to release my feet from the confines of the shoes
data.mid_motivation: I am trying to nurse my legs so I might use them to walk again.
data.long_motivation: I need to do all I can to get back on my feet so that my life will at least be worth living; since I would be able to move from place to place.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: wear shoes to hide my feet

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: get the traveler to carry me to the cave

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: drink medicinal herbs to help my legs recover

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: put some ointment in my feet to relieve pain

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: eat food given to me by the hunter
